Title: IAEA and Anglo American Launch Research Project Under Atoms4Food ...
Description: The IAEA and Anglo American announced a new partnership for a research project to fight soil salinization, under the joint FAO and IAEA Atoms4Food initiative that aims to address growing hunger around the world.

Title: Ministerial Declaration Adopted on Importance of Nuclear Science ...
Description: IAEA Member States have adopted a declaration recognizing the important role of nuclear science, technology and applications in addressing current and evolving global challenges. The declaration was unanimously adopted at the IAEA Ministerial Conference on Nuclear Science, Technology and Applications and the Technical Cooperation Programme in Vienna this morning.

Title: VIDEO: How the IAEA and Nuclear Techniques Support a Sustainable ...
Description: Nuclear science and technology play a significant role in improving the lives and well-being of people worldwide, especially in the fields of health, food and agriculture and the environment.

Title: How the IAEA and Nuclear Techniques Support a Sustainable Future
Description: Nuclear science and technology play a significant role in improving the lives and well-being of people worldwide, especially in the fields of health, food and agriculture and the environment.

Title: IAEA to Host Ministerial Conference on Nuclear Science and Techno...
Description: The 2024 Ministerial Conference on Nuclear Science, Technology and Applications and the Technical Cooperation Programme will take place on 26-28 November 2024 at the IAEA’s headquarters in Vienna, Austria.

Title: IAEA Mission Reviews Republic of Korea’s Regulatory Framework for...
Description: An International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) team of experts noted that the Republic of Korea demonstrates a high level of nuclear safety through its independent regulatory body and mature regulatory systems, promoting a strong safety culture. The team also identified some areas for further enhancements and encouraged the country to further align its regulatory framework with the IAEA safety standards.

Title: Update 261 – IAEA Director General Statement on Situation in Ukra...
Description: Nuclear safety and security 'remains in jeopardy' at Ukraine’s Zaporizhzhya Nuclear Power Plant (ZNPP), Director General Rafael Mariano Grossi told this week’s IAEA Board of Governors meeting, as the facility twice lost the connection to its only remaining 750 kilovolt (kV) power line within a few days.

Title: IAEA Sees Operational Safety Commitment at Hungary’s Paks Nuclear...
Description: An IAEA team of experts stated that the operator of Paks Nuclear Power Plant in Hungary has demonstrated a commitment to operational safety. The team also encouraged the operator to continue improvements in areas such as training on preventative measures and documentation to reduce the risk of human error.

Title: IAEA Delivers Ambulances to Ukrainian Nuclear Sites
Description: The International Atomic Energy Agency has handed over two new, fully equipped ambulances to Ukraine this week, providing vital medical support to the people working at its nuclear facilities.

Title: Director General Briefs Board on Iran Developments, Ukraine Suppo...
Description: The IAEA Director General has briefed the Board of Governors on his high-level meetings in Tehran last week, describing his discussions with the new government as constructive. Nevertheless, he pointed out, there were ongoing concerns.

Title: IAEA Director General's Introductory Statement to the Board of Go...
Description: Introductory Statement to the Board of Governors by IAEA Director General, Rafael Mariano Grossi.

Title: IAEA Boosts Medical Assistance to Ukraine Nuclear Sites with Deli...
Description: The IAEA handed over two new ambulances to Ukraine today to help ensure vital medical support for the people operating its nuclear power plants in difficult circumstances, an essential part of the IAEA’s wider efforts aimed at preventing a nuclear accident during the military conflict.

Title: Nuclear Power in the COP29 Spotlight as Countries and Companies E...
Description: Nuclear power is in the spotlight at the United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP29) in Azerbaijan, where both countries and industries presented plans to deploy the carbon-free energy technology, building on the historic consensus to accelerate its use that emerged from last year’s climate summit.

Title: IAEA Director General Receives Nuclear Statesman Award
Description: The IAEA Director General has been granted a major honour – the Henry DeWolf Smyth Nuclear Statesman Award – for outstanding service in developing and guiding the peaceful uses of nuclear energy.

Title: Update 260 – IAEA Director General Statement on Situation in Ukra...
Description: Ukraine’s operating nuclear power plants (NPPs) reduced electricity production as a precautionary measure this morning following widespread military activities across the country that reportedly targeted its energy infrastructure, putting nuclear safety and security under further pressure, Director General Rafael Mariano Grossi of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) said.

Title: Update 259 – IAEA Director General Statement on Situation in Ukra...
Description: Maintenance of several of the reactor safety systems is being conducted at Ukraine’s Zaporizhzhya Nuclear Power Plant (ZNPP), an essential part of wider efforts to prevent a nuclear accident during the military conflict, Director General Rafael Mariano Grossi of the International Atomic Energy (IAEA) said today.

Title: COP29: The Week in Review
Description: The IAEA is at COP29 in Baku, putting into place concrete measures to help countries use nuclear science and technology to fight climate change.

Title: COP29: First Week in Review
Description: The IAEA is at COP29 in Baku, putting into place concrete measures to help countries use nuclear science and technology to fight climate change.

Title: IAEA and EBRD Expand Cooperation to Nuclear Energy to Help Reach ...
Description: The IAEA and the EBRD are broadening their collaboration in the nuclear energy sector to help countries achieve net zero. This partnership represents a significant step, as it extends their cooperation beyond nuclear and radiation safety concerns.

Title: New IAEA and LinkedIn Practical Arrangement Brings Opportunities ...
Description: A new IAEA and LinkedIn Practical Arrangement will bring networking and training opportunities for women in the nuclear field.
